document.full_text: franco-belgian financial group dexia  is to hold talks with european union regulators in the coming days to amend a restructuring plan which it agreed to after receiving a bail-out in 2008.
document.title: dexia to seek new terms from european commission
lines_and_colors: franco-belgian financial group dexia  is to hold talks with european union regulators in the coming days to amend a restructuring plan which it agreed to after receiving a bail-out in 2008.
